'''''Telling It How It Is''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Snezhnaya Does Not Believe in Tears: Series I]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to obtain Mitachurl loot, Treasure Hoarder loot, and Ruin Guard for [[Viktor]] in the {{Quest|Tales of Winter}}.

==Gameplay Notes==
* Duplicate options are still available on repeat attempts, so the player should keep in mind which option(s) they previously chose.
* Successfully obtaining the achievement is a prerequisite for receiving the {{Quest|Return to Days of Winter}}.
